page.title: 17Entertainment_Leeswood area
page.content: Games in Leeswood and Treuddyn are very popular .They have 7 a side football tournaments at Phoenix Park. Boys play against near by villages, there are carpet bowls in the community centre which people use,and also out-door bowls greens in Coed Talon & Treuddyn. There is a pond called Alex's pond which is good if you like fishing. There are darts matches in Pontblyddyn which people from Leeswood come to. They have a league pub teams & clubs enter.We also have a cricket club where pubs teams play each other. Leeswood C.P. organized a football match for the Bradford fire appeal.We raised over Â£30.00 .In the community centre they have bingo for the OAPs. They also have over 60 club & whist drive.There is a Junior Youth Club.
